name: Knowtex
headline: Making doctors 2x more efficient with AI note-taking & charge capture
description:
We’re on a mission to leverage AI and voice technology to solve inefficiencies and revenue leakage in our healthcare system. With the rise of EHRs, the manual documentation burden on doctors has never been higher, leading to burnout and fatigue and high attrition rates. Assigning the correct diagnosis and billing codes is crucial for proper reimbursement and patient care, but medical coding is becoming more and more complex each year with growing numbers of codes (over 145,000 now), and doctors are unsupported by current technology to keep up with its ever increasing requirements. $125 billion is left on the table each year by healthcare organizations due to improper documentation and coding. 

Knowtex creates visit notes with up-to-date and accurate reimbursement codes from doctor-patient conversations, allowing the doctor to focus on patient care and preventing revenue leakage for hospital systems through standardized, transparent, and accurate documentation.
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:digital-health; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Caroline Zhang, Founder
founders.description: Caroline is the CEO of Knowtex. Before Knowtex, she worked in biomedical research at the Salk Institute of Biological Studies, investment banking at Morgan Stanley, and AI research and policy initiatives at Schmidt Futures. Caroline graduated from Stanford University with her master’s degree in Computer Science (concentration in AI), and an undergraduate degree in Economics with a minor in International Relations.

founders.name: Jocelyn Kang, Founder
founders.description: Jocelyn is the CTO of Knowtex. Before Knowtex, she worked at several startups in a variety of positions ranging from product manager to product designer to software engineer. She was a founding member of the product team at Learn to Win and has worked on AI/ML teams. Jocelyn graduated Phi Beta Kappa and Summa Cum Laude from Stanford University while pursuing an interdisciplinary degree in CS + Linguistics/Psychology, and a minor in Philosophy.

Voice AI Workflows for Clinicians
# Automate clinical workflows directly from medical conversations.
Transform medical conversations into detailed notes, codes, and orders. Save over 2 hours a day on admin tasks and focus on what matters most—patient care.
[Get started for free](http://www.knowtex.ai/</try-knowtex>)[Request a demo](http://www.knowtex.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/cmapes?uuid=5e8cb379-00b4-4720-aa62-a56a6b23dcc0>)
![Knowtex phone view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bc2ddc0fdae4665536ae6_Hero%20Phone.avif)

## Built smarter, not just better.
Let Knowtex adapt to your style, practice, and team - getting sharper with every use.
![Knowtex view from desktop and mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/67a20786a085f448978e8b36_Mockups.webp)
### Your Own Personalized AI
Get your own private Al model that's built to meet your needs.
Most popular
### Streamlined Billing
Most popular
Generates ICD-10, E&M, HCC, and CPT codes instantly.
### Seamless Integration
Integrates with most EHRs and can synthesize historic data.
### Multilingual Mastery
Understands accents and dialects from over 99 languages.
### Specialty Note Templates
Accurate, detailed notes ready to use out of the box.
### 100% Secure and Private
Upholding every standard to secure your data without exception.
### [RecordCapture natural conversation with the patient or verbatim dictation.](http://www.knowtex.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [AnalyzeAl extracts relevant medical information to generate a visit note with billing codes and orders.](http://www.knowtex.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [ReviewThe note is immediately available for review and sign-off before uploading directly into the EHR.](http://www.knowtex.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
## Streamline Billing
Generates ICD-10, E&M, HCC, and CPT codes instantly.
## See Knowtex In Action
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bd3c8d3967e94e3a0bc10_Video%20player.avif)](http://www.knowtex.ai/<#>)
## See What Our Users Are Saying
![Michael Nissenblatt](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c41f543f2901c4694b38_image%20\(19\).avif)
Michael Nissenblatt
MD, Oncologist
I find the system is particularly valuable in recording patients and families who are challenged in trying to relate a history, who are disorganized, who are tangential in their thoughts and presentation. System is able to re-organize the data in a serial and accurate manner.....it "untangles" things. During my learning curve, I see its best use is in creating a sensible and temporally accurate, sequential, history. The potential is enormous.
![Dr. Alexandra Caracitas](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c4ae6bb43351089702bb_image%20\(20\).avif)
Dr. Alexandra Caracitas
DO, Primary Care
It is easy to use and I like the feature of being able to record/add to the note after the visit with the patient, before uploading to OncoEMR. I did a few visits with patients that only spoke Portuguese and the translation was accurate. All of the patients consented to being recorded and using Knowtex.
![Aysha Khalid](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c51e3013e060f08317bc_image%20\(21\).avif)
Aysha Khalid
MD, Oncologist
At the end of the day I don’t want to go home with 30 notes and that’s not happening now [with Knowtex] which I’m happy about.
![Luis Jaramillo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c56d13eebcc2a5340c6b_image%20\(22\).avif)
Luis Jaramillo
MD, Plastic Surgeon
Knowtex does great with the clinic notes. Today I had an impressive result with a very complex conversation about cancer mastectomy in Spanish. The note came out fantastic. Knowtex also works with operative note dictations. I did a recording in the car with background noises and airpods and it was perfect. It blew my mind.
![Ephraim Dickinson](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c5caa2df93c708c401b4_image%20\(23\).avif)
Ephraim Dickinson
MD, Orthopedics
With Knowtex, I no longer have to spend hours after appointments typing or dictating notes. I can just have a natural conversation with the patient, and it automatically turns it into a detailed and accurate note with ICD-10, CPT, and E&M codes. I’m saving time on documentation and admin work, which means I can see more patients, have better work life balance, and deliver better care.
![Deborah Wong](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c6a1b5ba436d8e5d8ade_image%20\(24\).avif)
Deborah Wong
MD, Emergency Medicine
I'm a Knowtex convert, even though I'm a fast typer. I now use it for my initials and everything. Charting is so much better with Knowtex.
![Raymund David](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c6d734718697b02ee773_image%20\(25\).avif)
Raymund David
MD, Neurology
I'm using Knowtex for all my patients. It's really good. I'm really impressed. The way it communicates [the conversation] is really nice and it's fun to read. Before I had to stop and take notes in between each patient, now I can see patients one after the other and not worry about the note.
![Gordon Lundy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c72813eebcc2a535901e_lundy.avif)
Gordon Lundy
MD, Orthopedics
I used to be catching up on notes every night at home [before Knowtex], and now I can exercise and spend time with my grandchildren. Having accurate notes saves me from dealing with insurance too. It's way ahead of the curve.
![Sukhjeet S. Batth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c7dbce506fdfa850f66e_batth.avif)
Sukhjeet S. Batth
M.D., M.S., DABR. Radiation Oncology, Board Certified
I love it. I don’t have the mental energy to rehash everything through a voice-text system after I’m done [seeing patients]. Using Knowtex is less energy draining, and less tiring. It’s saving me 3-4 hours when I’m seeing new consults and also helps with extended follow-ups.
![Gregg Nicandri](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c82540c425c1689bd65f_greg.avif)
Gregg Nicandri
Orthopedic Surgeon, Chief Medical Information Officer
Knowtex significantly reduces the tremendous burden of admin work and improves wellness, which allows me to see more patients and generate more revenue. The technology pays for itself and it provides me the opportunity to truly focus on my patients - to listen, to empathize, and to educate - rather than being preoccupied with typing and clicking on a computer.
![Michael Gruttadauria](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c894543f2901c46d4fcf_grut.avif)
Michael Gruttadauria
Podiatry
I dictate the exam a lot. I bring Knowtex into the room for HPI, and will do [the] exam while patient is talking to me. Then when the I leaves the room, I will quickly dictate the physical exam, and any imaging findings so it basically will get the HPI, assessment, and plan. I often see more than 40 patients a day and Knowtex has saved me an immense amount of time.
![Susan McDowell](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c8cdb06d560975d3a1b3_25619.avif)
Susan McDowell
Orthopedic Oncologist
Since I started using Knowtex, I've been able to close my clinical notes much more efficiently. For a new patient visit, it used to take me about 20-25 minutes to manually dictate a note. But with Knowtex, it cuts my documentation time down by half, if not more than that. On days when I'm using Knowtex consistently for all my patient visits, I'm now able to close all my notes by the end of clinic. The time savings have been really significant and make such a difference in my productivity and workflow.
![Benedict DiGiovanni](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676bd57d4376fcc55ac7ce4e/6773c91cfc6d52e2fde54d8e_digi.avif)
Benedict DiGiovanni
Orthopedics
I feel as if it is it returned the joy of connecting with patients in the room and not being distracted. I think the patient felt that and I also felt that.
## Frequently Asked Questions
What makes Knowtex different?
Knowtex runs on proprietary AI models built to optimize specialty-specific information. The tool gets smarter the more it is used on a user, clinic, and global level. Knowtex also generates ICD-10-CM and CPT codes, including E/M codes based on the medical decision making complexity of the conversation, and time spent. Knowtex is multilingual and can process over 99 languages. Our advanced algorithms are designed to adapt to various accents and linguistic differences. Knowtex is compatible with most EHR systems. You can also bring in information from previous encounters with our integrated workflow, available in our group plan. It allows you to seamlessly integrate historical notes with new recordings to create your current notes. For specific integration details, please reach out to our support team at sales@knowtex.ai.
Where do I use Knowtex?
Knowtex is designed to work on any device with a microphone. You can access our AI app on iPhones, Android phones, iPads, etc. and through any web browser. For the optimal workflow, we recommend recording on a mobile device for best quality recordings, and reviewing and uploading notes from a web browser.
How can I make Knowtex work best for my workflow?
You can make changes to individual sections of your notes after the recording is generated on the Knowtex site. Knowtex learns from your edits in the web app and will adjust over time to your phrasing and styles. We can also set up custom templates based on your previous notes. Our system also supports multi-user workflows. Team members such as medical assistants, nurse practitioners, registered nurses, and physicians can work together on Knowtex to produce a single, comprehensive note.
Can I try Knowtex?
We offer a 7-day free trial with unlimited notes. Pricing is customized based on a group’s specific requirements. You can initiate your trial in the [Try Kontext](http://www.knowtex.ai/<https:/www.knowtex.ai/try-knowtex>) area or more information about group rates, please email our team at sales@knowtex.ai. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bf8a9d654a32ec1976881_bg%20pattern%203.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bdce9b9a0a4b4dd2a857d_bg%20pattern%2002.svg)
## Ready to Experience Knowtex?
Start with a 7-day free trial—no strings attached. Dive into unlimited notes and explore features designed to make your workday smoother.
[Get started for free](http://www.knowtex.ai/</try-knowtex>)[Request a demo](http://www.knowtex.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/cmapes?uuid=5e8cb379-00b4-4720-aa62-a56a6b23dcc0>)

But with Knowtex, it cuts my documentation time down by half, if not more than that. On days when I'm using Knowtex consistently for all my patient visits, I'm now able to close all my notes by the end of clinic. The time savings have been really significant and make such a difference in my productivity and workflow.
![Benedict DiGiovanni⟨24⟩]
Benedict DiGiovanni
Orthopedics
I feel as if it is it returned the joy of connecting with patients in the room and not being distracted. I think the patient felt that and I also felt that.
## Frequently Asked Questions
What makes Knowtex different?
Knowtex runs on proprietary AI models built to optimize specialty-specific information. The tool gets smarter the more it is used on a user, clinic, and global level. Knowtex also generates ICD-10-CM and CPT codes, including E/M codes based on the medical decision making complexity of the conversation, and time spent. Knowtex is multilingual and can process over 99 languages. Our advanced algorithms are designed to adapt to various accents and linguistic differences. Knowtex is compatible with most EHR systems. You can also bring in information from previous encounters with our integrated workflow, available in our group plan. It allows you to seamlessly integrate historical notes with new recordings to create your current notes. For specific integration details, please reach out to our support team at sales@knowtex.ai.
Where do I use Knowtex?
Knowtex is designed to work on any device with a microphone. You can access our AI app on iPhones, Android phones, iPads, etc. and through any web browser. For the optimal workflow, we recommend recording on a mobile device for best quality recordings, and reviewing and uploading notes from a web browser.
How can I make Knowtex work best for my workflow?
You can make changes to individual sections of your notes after the recording is generated on the Knowtex site. Knowtex learns from your edits in the web app and will adjust over time to your phrasing and styles. We can also set up custom templates based on your previous notes. Our system also supports multi-user workflows. Team members such as medical assistants, nurse practitioners, registered nurses, and physicians can work together on Knowtex to produce a single, comprehensive note.
Can I try Knowtex?
We offer a 7-day free trial with unlimited notes. Pricing is customized based on a group’s specific requirements. You can initiate your trial in the Try Kontext⟨25⟩ area or more information about group rates, please email our team at sales@knowtex.ai. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bf8a9d654a32ec1976881_bg%20pattern%203.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676b3dcfe6482ad9e5e19d3e/676bdce9b9a0a4b4dd2a857d_bg%20pattern%2002.svg)
## Ready to Experience Knowtex?
Start with a 7-day free trial—no strings attached. Dive into unlimited notes and explore features designed to make your workday smoother.
Get started for free⟨4⟩Request a demo⟨5⟩

generated_description:
**Knowtex: Revolutionizing Healthcare Documentation with AI**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Knowtex is on a mission to enhance the efficiency of healthcare professionals. With a headquarters in San Francisco, the company aims to make doctors twice as efficient through advanced AI-driven note-taking and charge capture technologies.

The healthcare industry is facing a crisis. Electronic Health Records (EHRs) have introduced a massive documentation burden, leading to doctor burnout and high attrition rates. In fact, a staggering $125 billion is lost annually due to inadequate documentation and complex medical coding—which now boasts an overwhelming 145,000 codes. To tackle these challenges, Knowtex leverages AI and voice technology, transforming doctor-patient conversations into detailed notes and accurate billing codes.

### Key Features
- **Automated Workflows**: Knowtex eliminates the tedious administrative tasks, saving clinicians over two hours a day by generating detailed notes directly from conversations.
- **Accurate Billing**: Instantly creates ICD-10, E&M, HCC, and CPT codes tailored to the complexity of the interaction, ensuring providers get paid what they're due.
- **Multilingual Capabilities**: The software can understand accents and dialects from over 99 languages, making it accessible to a diverse range of patients.
- **Easy Integration**: Knowtex integrates seamlessly with most EHR systems, allowing for smooth transitions and historical data synthesis.

### User Testimonials
The voices of satisfied users are powerful. Doctors report significantly reduced time spent on documentation, allowing them to focus more on patient care. For example, physicians have noted improvements in their work-life balance, with many expressing joy in connecting more deeply with their patients during visits instead of being distracted by typing notes.

### The Impact
By providing a streamlined, AI-powered solution to documentation and billing, Knowtex addresses a critical pain point in healthcare. As clinicians become more efficient, they can devote more attention to patient care, ultimately improving outcomes and satisfaction for both doctors and patients.

### Interested in Learning More?
If you're intrigued by the potential of AI in healthcare and want to explore how Knowtex can transform your practice, they offer a free 7-day trial with unlimited notes. You can start here: [Get Started with Knowtex](http://www.knowtex.ai/).

In the landscape of healthcare technology, Knowtex is not just another tool—it's a paradigm shift toward smarter, more efficient medical practice. The future of healthcare documentation looks promising, and Knowtex is leading the charge.
